tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE interactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    solution_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agent_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_date DATETIME,
  agent_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  solution_id INT,
  practice_id INT
);
